item.title: Adam Czepielik
item.author: adam.czepielik@gmail.com (Adam Czepielik)
item.description: I’m a data scientist, based in Krak√≥w, Poland. From time to time I find myself trapped in a curiosity well around some topic. At that time my friends can freqently hear “I about to write a blog post about X, it’s exciting”. Then, well, several months have to pass and then I post. Anyway, here’s my CV:
